Title: SCWS
Description:
SCWS - XML web service for Microsoft System Center Operations Manager (AKA SCOM / OpsMgr).  Developed in C# and .Net 3.5 with Visual Studio 2010.

Can be used to get information on MonitoringObjects and to control maintenance mode.   Ideal for integration with SCCM / ConfigMgr.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
SCWS - XML web service for Microsoft System Center Operations Manager (AKA SCOM / OpsMgr). Developed in C# and .Net 3.5 with Visual Studio 2010.

Can be used to get information on MonitoringObjects and to control maintenance mode. Ideal for integration with SCCM / ConfigMgr.

The following methods are provided by the web service:
 GetAllMonitoringClasses
 GetMMReasons
 GetMonitoringObectId
 GetMonitoringObjectInfo
 GetObjectsInMM
 MMStartByGroupName
 MMStartByMonitoringObjectId
 MMStartByWindowsComputerName
 MMStopByGroupName
 MMStopByMonitoringObjectId
 MMStopByWindowsComputerName
 QueryMonitoringObjectsByClassName


See the downloads page for the web service and the web service clients
TagList: web service,web services,OpsMgr,system center,Operations Manager,maintenance mode,
